column4: Hello, people i need a little help. I run Ubuntu 8.10 Desktop and i want to set up an VPN connection, having ethernet connection working, and with admininstrator rights. Add button seems to be disabled. Thanks beforehand
In the connections window... You know, accessible trough tray (or whatever is it called properly, i switched just yesterday)
Will try.... Apt-get is acting somewhat strange, though, it does not even install aplications listed in help file
just try typing "sudo apt-get install openvpn", then your VPN-related button in the network config applet might get enabled
